biotools.summary:
a software package for prioritization of candidate cancer subtype-specific drugs.

This package provides subpathway data, drug-subpathway association data and gene expression profile (GEO accession: GSE45827) to support the SubtypeDrug package.

A systematic biology tool was developed to prioritize cancer subtype-specific drugs by integrating genetic perturbation, drug action, biological pathway, and cancer subtype.
